data.question: What is the formula of HIAM-301?
At what temperature were the NPD data of activated HIAM-301 collected?
What is the space group of HIAM-301?
What method was used to refine the NPD data of activated HIAM-301?
How many independent D-DMA sites were identified in the cage of HIAM-301?
Does HIAM-301 exhibit higher adsorption capacity for propylene or propane?
Is the adsorption selectivity of HIAM-301 for propylene over propane greater than 100?
Was the adsorption of propylene on HIAM-301 confirmed by computational modeling?
Is the pore structure of HIAM-301 ideal for the adsorptive separation of propylene and propane?
Does HIAM-301 have a BET surface area greater than 500 m2/g?
Is the isosteric heat of adsorption for propylene on HIAM-301 higher than that of JNU-3a?
Can HIAM-301 be used for the production of polymer-grade propylene?
What is the crystal system of HIAM-301?
What is the role of DMA cations in HIAM-301?
data.answer: They regulate the pore aperture of the MOF.

data.question: What is the main challenge in developing efficient sorbents for propylene/propane separation?
data.answer: Achieving both a high adsorption capacity and selectivity.

data.question: Does HIAM-301 show selective molecular exclusion of propane?
What is the pore volume of HIAM-301?
What is the packing density of propylene in HIAM-301?
Did the INS measurements indicate strong hostâ€“guest interactions for propylene in HIAM-301?
What is the significance of the distorted pore structure in HIAM-301 for gas separation?
data.answer: It allows for distinct adsorption of propylene and the total exclusion of propane.
